column10: POWER GIRDLE: If used to industrialize a non-atmospheric site of size 8+, you permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.
DIVINING NUBOTS: -1 ISRU for Colocated ISRU platform.
THORIUM BREEDER: -3 to Colocated size rolls on S Sites.
ARCOLOGY: Decommissioning of a robonaut is not needed when this is used to industrialize in the zones Mercury, Venus, Earth
FOAMED NICKEL: -1 to Colocated size rolls.
SCOOP: If operational, this card makes adjacent or colocated aerostat sites into [2 hydration]
SUPERLENS: -1 to all Colocated raygun size rolls.
SCAVENGING: If Colocated, doubles FTs during site refuel.
COMET LICHEN: -2 to Colocated size rolls on D Sites.
MINE REVIVAL: As an op, remove a busted disk and place Claim on a Colocated Site of Size 2+.
IONOSAT: If used to industrialize an Atmospheric Site, permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.
JELLYBOTS: Colocated industrialization is a free action.
